| image = | caption = Photo of Charmaine Sinclair | birth_name = | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1971|4|23|df=y}}<ref name="autogenerated1">[http://www.iafd.com/person.rme/perfid=CharmaineSinclair/gender=f/Charmaine-Sinclair/gender=f Charmaine Sinclair - Internet Adult Film Database profile]</ref> | birth_place = [[Chertsey]], [[Surrey]]<ref name="autogenerated1"/> | death_date = | death_place = | spouse = | height = {{height|ft=5|in=8}} | weight = {{convert|9|st|lb kg|abbr=on}} | eye_color = Dark brown | hair_color = Dark brown (Now with highlights) | ethnicity = [[Portuguese people|Portuguese]]-[[Non-resident Indian and Person of Indian Origin|Indian]], [[Jamaica]]n<ref name="WoC">[http://www.worldofcharmaine.com/biopage.htm World of Charmaine] â shrine site with magazine notes and bio</ref> | alias = Charmaine Garth | number_of_films = 4 (Per [[IAFD]]) | website = http://www.charmainesinclairlive.co.uk/ | spelling = UK<!-- US for color, UK for colour --> }} __notoc__ '''Charmaine Sinclair''' is an [[United Kingdom|English]] [[glamour photography|glamour model]] and [[pornographic actor|pornographic actress]].
==Biography== Sinclair became a glamour model at the age of 16.<ref name=Independent>{{cite news |url=http://www.independent.co.uk/life-style/interview-charmaine-sinclair--all-glammed-out-and-nowhere-to-go-1187977.html |title=Interview: Charmaine Sinclair - All glammed out and nowhere to go |accessdate=2009-06-30 |author=Hettie Judah |date=1998-11-29 |work=[[The Independent]] |accessdate=2009-09-17 }}</ref> Most of her modelling was glamour and [[softcore]] in British [[men's magazines]] such as [[Fiesta (magazine)|Fiesta]]. For over two years in the mid-1990s, she was featured monthly in ''[[Club (magazine)|Club]]'' magazine. She was a popular [[Page 3 girl]]. Sinclair appeared in nine [[List of Playboy NSS models (SâZ)|Playboy lingerie special editions]], sometimes as "Charmaine Garth."<ref name="PB">[http://www.playboy.com/specialeditions Playboy Special Editions] â model notes</ref> She was also a [[lingerie]] model for various mail order companies.
Sinclair's career as an actress in videos began in 1990 with a series of [[softcore]] movies in which she played a sexy [[private investigator|private eye]] named Samantha Spade.<ref name="IMDB">[http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1086566/ Internet Movie Database]</ref> She also appeared in several [[hardcore pornography|hardcore]] films.<ref name=Independent/> Sinclair had a role in the Italian comedy ''Cous Cous'' (1996).<ref name="IMDB"/>
Sinclair was romantically linked to [[Robert De Niro]] for two years, circa 1993-1995.<ref>''Untouchable: Robert De Niro: The Unauthorised Biography'', Andy Dougan, Virgin Books, 2000</ref>
Sinclair retired from modelling and acting in late 1998 or 1999.<ref name=Independent/>
